entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
